channel.title: Astralpk | 24/7 | 317 | Custom items and more!
channel.description:
[center][img]http://astralpk.com/Astralpk-logo.png[/img][/center] [B][COLOR="Purple"][SIZE="5"]Hello dear members.Server has been reborn,after a long time.The owners changed,but the same good content is the same.We had 170 players max,then due to economy and other reasons,we sadly closed.[/SIZE][/COLOR][/B]
[B][B][SIZE="4"][COLOR="SeaGreen"]No torva,no korasis,no newschool items.Old pi with a few customs- Coloured whips,dragon kite.Now u may say,eww,customs,forget that,im not joining.The whips,have effects like-They can barrage whip spec,poison,teleblock.Thats it.Dragon kite isn't really common item,so they're like dragon defenders but only they have big def bonuses.The xp and drop rates are quite big,so u will lvl up fast and get decent armour in a few hours.We are trying to get back our players,so please give it a try[/COLOR][/SIZE][/B][/B]
[LEFT][SIZE="5"][COLOR="Red"]Client - [URL=http://"http://Astralpk.com/AstralpkClient.rar/"]here[/URL] Forums - [URL=http://"http://Astralpk.com/Forum/"]here[/URL]
We offer you:
-Stable economy. -24/7 Vps. -Good PvP Combat -Friendly staff members -Many bosses -Many minigames -Custom items -No lagg -100 % working Divine and Elysian effects -Normal drops + u got a small chance of getting a pvp armour/weapon. -Working Arcane stream,Sol -Chaotics,that aren't overpovered -Pkp shop, to gain Fire cape,Zerk ring, fighter hat and alot more -Artifacts,also gainable from Player killing,just bigger chance to get it. Sell those for cash.... -Donator shop with good benefits -Arma and Bandos bosses -Corp in the wilderness -Tormented demons -Slayer shop to obtain chaotics and slayer helmet -100% working ring of wealth -Fully working Void effects -Clue scrolls with 3rd age rewards -Theres more,just come and you'll see it yourself.[/COLOR][/SIZE][/LEFT]
[CENTER][IMG]http://Astralpk.com/pic/1.PNG[/img]

[IMG]http://Astralpk.com/pic/3.PNG[/img]

[SIZE="7"] And more![/SIZE][/CENTER]

item.dc:creator: @astralpkv astralpkv
item.description:
@astralpkv wrote:

[center][/center]
[COLOR=“Purple”][SIZE=“5”]Hello dear members.Server has been reborn,after a long time.The owners changed,but the same good content is the same.We had 170 players max,then due to economy and other reasons,we sadly closed.[/SIZE][/COLOR]

[SIZE=“4”][COLOR=“SeaGreen”]No torva,no korasis,no newschool items.Old pi with a few customs- Coloured whips,dragon kite.Now u may say,eww,customs,forget that,im not joining.The whips,have effects like-They can barrage whip spec,poison,teleblock.Thats it.Dragon kite isn’t really common item,so they’re like dragon defenders but only they have big def bonuses.The xp and drop rates are quite big,so u will lvl up fast and get decent armour in a few hours.We are trying to get back our players,so please give it a try[/COLOR][/SIZE]

[LEFT][SIZE=“5”][COLOR=“Red”]Client - here
Forums - here

We offer you:

-Stable economy.
-24/7 Vps.
-Good PvP Combat
-Friendly staff members
-Many bosses
-Many minigames
-Custom items
-No lagg
-100 % working Divine and Elysian effects
-Normal drops + u got a small chance of getting a pvp armour/weapon.
-Working Arcane stream,Sol
-Chaotics,that aren’t overpovered
-Pkp shop, to gain Fire cape,Zerk ring, fighter hat and alot more
-Artifacts,also gainable from Player killing,just bigger chance to get it. Sell those for cash…
-Donator shop with good benefits
-Arma and Bandos bosses
-Corp in the wilderness
-Tormented demons
-Slayer shop to obtain chaotics and slayer helmet
-100% working ring of wealth
-Fully working Void effects
-Clue scrolls with 3rd age rewards
-Theres more,just come and you’ll see it yourself.[/COLOR][/SIZE][/LEFT]

[SIZE=“7”]
And more![/SIZE][/CENTER]
